price: 众目不能见他，他却能见众目。他是精明的，是彻知的。
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
